fields.label: Does your business provide for the verification of KYC information about an individual by means of reliable and independent documentation?
Does your program require that any document from which you verify an individual's identity has not expired (excepting Australian passports expired within the last 2 years)?
Does your business determine what reliable and independent documentation you require for the purpose of verifying an individual's name and date of birth and/or residential address?
fields.detail-label: Describe the documentation required for verifying an individual's name, DOB, and/or residential address.

fields.label: Does your business determine what reliable and independent documentation may be used to verify any other KYC information about an individual?
fields.detail-label: Specify the documentation used to verify other KYC information about an individual.

fields.label: Does your business determine the circumstances in which you are prepared to rely on a copy of a reliable and independent document for an individual?
fields.detail-label: Describe the circumstances and conditions for relying on copies of documents for individuals.

fields.label: Does your business determine the circumstances and steps taken to identify if a document produced about an individual has been forged, tampered with, cancelled, or stolen?
fields.detail-label: Describe the process for identifying and handling forged, tampered, or stolen documents for individuals.

fields.label: Does your business determine whether you will use any authentication service available in respect of a document for an individual?
fields.detail-label: Describe the authentication services used for individual customer documents.

fields.label: Does your business determine whether and how to confirm KYC information about an individual by independently initiating contact with them?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedures for confirming identity by independently initiating contact with an individual.

fields.label: Does your business provide for the verification of KYC information about a customer who is not an individual by means of reliable and independent documentation?
Does your business determine what and how many reliable and independent documents you will use for the purpose of verifying a non-individual customer?
fields.detail-label: Specify the types and number of documents used to verify non-individual customers.

fields.label: Does your business determine whether a document produced about a non-individual customer may have been forged, tampered with, cancelled or stolen?
fields.detail-label: Describe the steps taken to identify if a document for a non-individual has been forged, tampered, or stolen.

fields.label: Does your business determine whether and in what circumstances you are prepared to rely on a copy of a reliable and independent document for a non-individual customer?
fields.detail-label: Describe the circumstances and conditions for relying on copies of documents for non-individuals.

fields.label: Does your business determine what reliable and independent documentation may be used to verify any other information about a non-individual customer?
fields.detail-label: Specify the documentation used to verify other KYC information about a non-individual customer.

fields.label: Does your business determine whether you will use any authentication service available in respect of a document for a non-individual customer?
fields.detail-label: Describe the authentication services used for non-individual customer documents.

fields.label: Does your business determine whether and how to confirm information about a non-individual customer by independently initiating contact with them?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedures for confirming information by independently initiating contact with a non-individual customer.

groups.title: Part 4.9: Verification from Documentation
groups.description: Requirements for programs that verify KYC information using reliable and independent documentation.

groups.title: Verification Systems (Individuals)
groups.description: Mandatory risk-based systems and controls for verifying individual customers via documents.

groups.title: Verification Systems (Non-Individuals)
groups.description: Mandatory risk-based systems and controls for verifying customers other than individuals via documents.
